name: Horse
details: “I am warm, caring, and sensitive to the needs of others.”

name: Dove
details: “I am a peacemaker, sometimes too passive for my own good.”

name: Turtle
details: “I am cautious and consistent, and I want to follow clear-cut guidelines.”

name: Owl
details: “I enjoy investigating complex issues that few are even interested in.”

name: Cat
details: “I tend to obsess, take things personally, and dwell on the past.”

name: Fox
details: “I am fun-loving and spontaneous; I try to keep my life exciting.”

name: Bear
details: “My dominating personality allows me to take charge and gain recognition.”
